Intercepting a moving target

A target is moving from point {{target}} to point {{targetDestination}} at a constant speed of {{targetSpeed}}. A missile needs to intercept the target before it arrives at its destination. The missile has an initial position of {{source}} and moves at a constant speed of {{sourceSpeed}}. This program finds the collision.
